byline.original: By SAMEER YASIR and HARI KUMAR

lead_paragraph: Over the past weeks, 24 schools have been set ablaze, dashing hopes for a return to normalcy in the region after months of protests and curfews.
snippet: Over the past weeks, 24 schools have been set ablaze, dashing hopes for a return to normalcy in the region after months of protests and curfews....

headline.main: Unrest in Kashmir Claims New Casualties: Schools
headline.print_headline: Unrest in Kashmir Hits Fresh Targets: Schools
